1.content:
Lucy (5’5 20 years old): A woman with very petite frame who was awarded custody of her little 12 year old sister Wendy and has become the only positive mother figure for her sister to which she takes great pride in. Due to her petite frame Lucy has to wear custom made clothes that gives the illusion of a more mature build. Lucy has shoulder length blonde hair that she usually wears in a ponytail when at home, Lucy primarily likes to wear pants but will wear skirts from time to time which is the opposite of Wendy who loves dresses. Despite her serious exterior Lucy has a fondness for harmless pranks mainly on Wendy who has been trying to get her back

Brad (5’3 15 years old) A boy who has a friendly rivalry with his twin sister Britney with the two of them trying to prove which of them is better with varying results. Brad and Britney never back down from acting challenges and this Has led them to develop A serious sense of determination

Olivia 5’6 (long blonde hair 17) likes to wear boys clothes as she doesnt like how girly she is made to look by her mother and borrows her brothers clothes when her mother isnt home

11.content: How does lucy end up swapping clothes with someone
11.title: Lucy

choices: Lucy and wendy at the audition
Lucy and wendy on the show
111.content:
It was an average Saturday afternoon and Lucy was sitting in front of her tv with her little sister Wendy watching their favourite gameshow spin that wheel where contestants have to complete what ever challenges they get from spinning a wheel for A chance to win the prize of $50,000

“They wont win you know” said Wendy as she re adjusted herself in her seat

“What makes say that” asked Lucy

“Well the contestant on this episode only got to the final because the others got impossible dares” answered Wendy

“Well that is true” replied Lucy as she turned back to the tv and noticed that the contestants were about to loose as they saw what their dare was

“Well unfortunately for our contestant she has decided to not do the final dare and they will not win the the $50,000 but they wont be going home empty handed as they did win $1000 after completing the mystery dare” said the host as he handed the contestant a check for $1000

“You know i think either of us could do better” said Wendy

“Well you might get your chance as the host just announced that they are gonna hold auditions for the show in our city and they are looking for siblings to compete”

“When are the auditions” asked Wendy as she got up from her seat

“They’re tomorrow and yes we can go down but make sure you wear something nice tomorrow” said Lucy as she turned the tv off

“Ok then goodnight” said Wendy as she started to walk up the stairs to gi to bed

“GoodNight wendy i’ll be up in a couple minutes, make sure to brush your teeth before you go to bed” said lucy

“Yeah i know i mean you say it every night” said wendy as she reached the top of the stairs

What happens next

choices: 4 rounds in- Lucy and Wendy are losing
4 rounds in- Lucy and Wendy are winning
1112.content:
A week later Lucy and Wendy were now competing on spin that wheel, they were competing against a team consisting of two brothers who seemed rather arrogant

“You two should just give up as my little brother and i are gonna win this thing and get that sweet $50,000” Said the older brother as he heard the host starting the show

“Ok Wendy we are gonna make sure we win as those two don't deserve to win” said lucy while watching the two brothers being introduced to the audience

“I agree as the little brother tried to put the moves on me till i made sure he knew i wasn't interested” said Wendy

“Well when we win we can shove our win in their faces” said Lucy while laughing

“Thats the first team ladies and gentlemen now meet the team of sisters competing against the boys” said the host as Lucy and Wendy entered

“Why don’t you tell our lovely audience your names”

“Im lucy” Said lucy

“And I'm Wendy” Said wendy

“Its a pleasure to meet you two lovely ladies, will you head to your podium”

“Sure, cmon Wendy” said lucy

“Ok now that we have met the contestants i will explain the rules incase this is the first time anyone has watched, I will flip a coin to determine who spins the wheel first, the winner will spin the point wheel first to show how many points their dare will be worth, after that they will spin the dare wheel to determine their dare, if you don’t do the challenge the other team will have the chance to do it but for half the points. Do you understand” Said the host

“Yes we do” said everyone

“Ok then lets play spin that wheel” Said the host as the audience started to cheer

What happens next
1112.title: Lucy and wendy on the show

11121.content:
After the first 4 rounds Lucy and Wendy were losing badly and needed double their current points to catch up to the brothers as they seemed to have next to no shame

“God damn it i shouldn't have passed that dare” though Lucy as she saw the older brother clucking like a chicken until a buzzed could be heard signalling the end of the dare

“To easy” said the older brother as he walked back to his podium

“Ok now lets look at the scores, first we have jake and jack with 370 points while Lucy and Wendy are dragging behind with 240 points, now Lucy spin that wheel” said the host

As the wheel was spinning Lucy and wendy were hoping for an easy dare and a lot of points as the brother’s arrogance was quite visible at this point,after a fifteen seconds the point wheel stopped at 150 points which excited Lucy and wendy

“Ok to see what lucy will have to do for 150 points she will now spin the dare wheel” said the host as lucy turned towards the dare wheel

“Something easy, something easy” thought lucy

As the wheel began to slow down the audience was shocked to see that the wheel had landed on double or nothing which was surprising as it was A very rare thing to see as it has only happened a few times in the past as a way to give the losing team a chance to catch up

“Oh double or nothing thats rare, well that means that Lucy AND Wendy will have to do the dare to get the double points or the brothers will get 75 point” said the host

“Well that ain’t happening as we are gonna do what it take to win” said Wendy with little to no hesitation

“Well whenever your ready lucy spin the wheel again” said the host

After the the wheel started to slow down everyone was curious to see what it would land on and when it stopped it landed on swap all your clothes with your partner, after the wheel had stopped and everyone knew what it had landed on the two brothers started laughing

“Well Lucy will you and Wendy swap clothes for 300 points” asked the host

“Yes we will as we plan to win” said Lucy

“Ok then, while you two do the swap we will cut to commercial” said the host

“If you two will follow the stage hand she will lead you to a private room so you can swap” said the host after he knew the cameras had stopped recording

What happens next

111211.content:
Lucy was shocked at the fact that she had agreed to swap clothes with her little sister though this wouldn't be the first time that she had worn Wendy’s clothes as she had to wear them once after she had accidentally spilled paint over her clothes and had nothing else to wear

Upon entering the room Lucy noticed a curtain that divided the room in two, “i guess we both take one area to change in” though lucy until her thoughts were interrupted by Wendy

“This is gonna be fun Lucy and i cant wait to try on your adult clothes, maybe when we get home we can try on some more of each others clothes as i have some outfits i think you will look adorable in” said Wendy in an excited tone

“Yeah maybe tonight we go to bed in each others room” said Lucy sarcastically

“And maybe tomorrow we swap roles, meaning i would be you while you be me” said Wendy in an excited tone not noticing Lucy’s sarcasm

“Lets not go that far yet as we still have to win the show you know” said Lucy as she went to the opposite side of the room and began to strip

“Lucy are you gonna give me your corset, pushup bra and your falsies” asked Wendy as she removed the light blue sundress she was wearing and revealing the cotton panties and training bra she had on underneath the dress

“Yeah as they are part of my clothes though i don’t think i should give you my falsies as you know i don’t like being outside the house without them” said Lucy as she removed her jeans to reveal her black silk panties

“Well if we are going to be wearing each other’s bra i think i would need them to help fill it out” said Wendy as she started to get her clothes folded and put into a pile

“Fine but be careful with them as they were expensive” said Lucy as she removed her shirt to reveal the matching black silk push up bra she had on while carefully removing her falsies

“Ok Lucy here are my or i should say your new clothes” said Wendy while giggling like the school girl she is

“They are not my new clothes Wendy” said Lucy as she took the clothes from Wendy and handed her pile over

After the sisters had swap their clothes pile they began to get dressed

Who do we follow

1112111.content:
After receiving the pile of Wendy’s clothes lucy began to get dressed and decided to put the training bra on first and as she got it comfortably around her small chest she noticed something odd

“I didnt think her training bra would fit me so well” thought Lucy as she went back to the pile to put Wendys little girl panties on and was once again surprised at how well they fit her

“I guess i shouldn’t be surprised as i do have a small frame for someone my age” thought Lucy as she slid Wendy’s panties on

After the Wendy’s underwear was on comfortably lucy walked over to Wendy’s dress she noticed a tag on it and noticed that it was a size tag which said small, this caused Lucy to blush as she realised how similar in size she was to her sister who is eight years younger than her

After getting the dress on Lucy felt a little uncomfortable as she was used to wearing jeans when she was out as she only wore dresses to formal occasions such as weddings though thr fact that it was her little sisters dress didn't help with that, when the dress was on Lucy noticed a mirror and was surprised by the reflection

Rather than looking like herself dressed in Wendy’s clothes she looked just like Wendy but with her own hairstyle

“I not surprised that your shocked by your reflection as i was to” said a Wendy as she passed through the curtain

After turning around Lucy was astounded by how much Wendy looked like her though they both had their original hair styles and hair colours

“Well we can change that you know” said lucy as she took her hair out of its ponytail and haded Wendy the hair tie and made Wendy give her the bow she had in her hair

“Yeah as we might as well go all out for this” Said Lucy as she managed to put her hair into the same style Wendy had before their swap

After a couple of minutes Lucy and Wendy were completely dressed in each others clothes and had successfully changed their hairstyles to what the other had prior to the swap

What happens next

choices: Mockingly mimic each other for the rest of the show
11121111.content:
“Are you ready to head back to the show?” Asked Lucy who was still slightly embarrassed by how identical she looked to her little sister without her corset, or falsies to sneak her look more mature.

Meanwhile Wendy felt excited and empowered by how mature she got to look thanks to the swap challenge, responding to Lucy’s question with a confident “yeah let’s do this”.

Both sisters got back onto the set, just after the commercial break ended, and the crowd went wild for how the two sisters looked.

Lucy walked in sheepishly as she wasn’t exactly happy about looking so immature and young, while her sister walked in with extreme confidence even striking a pose for the cameras filming her which made the audience cheer them on more.

Once both Wendy and Lucy got back to their places in the show, the host was left stunned by the sight he saw before him.

“Woah wait hang on a second did you guys even switch I can’t tell the difference?” The host joked making the audience and Wendy laugh while Lucy just wanted to get the show over with.

“Y-yeah we did swap” sheepishly responded Lucy to the hosts hold which actually got some of the audience members to say ‘Aww’ making the grown women feel even more embarrassed.

The host then continued on with the game show “well Girls I must say we are all amazed by how easily you took the dare on, and I’d say you should get you’re points right now, however since you two easily swapped into the roles of each other, me and the writers thought that I’d only be fair to the brothers that you have do one extra dare on top of the one you’re doing for the points.

Both sisters looked at each other, Lucy now feeling slight annoyed that she wasn’t even gonna her the points for her embarrassment, while the brothers just snickered at them.

Lucy then swallowed her pride and agreed to the conditions as she span the wheel again to get the dare for the sisters.

The wheel eventually stopped spinning and both sisters blushed when they saw that they had too....
11121111.title: They both head back to the show

choices: Yes to the deal, and Wendy begins to play dress up with her little sis
No, and Wendy gives her a makeover in her sleep.
11121112.content:
Just as Lucy and Wendy where about to head back onto the show, a loud alarm started blaring as the back of the set was engulfed in a red flashing light.

Immediately people started to panic and leave the set as the game show host and the sisters competition on the show rushed through one the fire exits.

Immediately Lucy grabbed one of the camera women’s hand who was trying to leave. “Excuse me miss what’s happening.” Lucy asked worried as Wendy started to get worried by all of the commotion.

“One of the challenges those stupid brothers did went out of hand and the set kinda burst into flames, but don’t you worry about that little girl you just let you’re big sister here take you home.” Said the camera women making Lucy blush as she realised she still looked like Wendy right now, who giggled at the camera women’s easy mistake, deciding to play along with it as well.

“Yeah she’s right, come on Wendy let’s get you home so you can go back to playing with you’re dolly’s.” mocked Wendy giggling as Lucy blushed getting annoyed at the camera women.

Both sisters then made a bolt for the first fire exit and immediately got to the car.

Lucy then tried to search for her car keys only to realise that Wendy has them. “Wendy give me my car keys we need to get out of here quickly.” Demanded Lucy wanting to get home and forget about this mess.

However Wendy realised a problem that Lucy want thinking off. “But Lucy I look like you and if the cops pulls us over and see you driving they could take us to jail.”

Lucy realised what this meant and hated it, as it meant that Lucy would have to let Wendy do the thing she was scared to let her do even when she was old enough.

“Hmph fine Wendy you can drive, but only just this once.” Stated Lucy as Wendy’s eyes gleamed in excitement as she opened the car door and slammed her foot on the gas.

For the next ten minutes Lucy was terrified as her little sister sped down the road to here house, with almost every turn in the car being a possible car crash. Wendy meanwhile was laughing in crazed joy as she drove home like a crazed maniac. And eventually somehow, Wendy was able to get them home in one piece as she poorly parked the car, which made the neighbours give her a look.

Wendy then opened the door as she led her older sister back into the house.

“YOU ARE NEVER DRIVING AGAIN WENDY!” Screamed Lucy as she caught her breath, while Wendy just giggled.

“Anyway let’s get changed I wanna be me again!” Commanded Lucy as she took the bow out of her hair.

However Wendy, wasn’t undressing as she prepared to explain her plan to Lucy. “Actually Lucy why don’t we stay as each other for a little while.” Suggested Wendy.

“What why?”. Questioned Lucy.

“Well because it’s fun pretending to be you, and I know you enjoy dressing like a little girl somewhat.” She explained making Lucy blush as she knew that Deep down that was true, however Lucy was still unconvinced.

“Sorry Wendy I know you like wearing my clothes but this just is a bit too immature for me.” She explained making Wendy pit as the phone rang.

Lucy picked it up only to discover the host was phoning her asking them to come back once the set was fixed to make up for their game being cut short. That’s when Lucy had a idea, what if she stayed las Wendy for the week, that way when they came back, if they had to swap clothes again they couldn’t be embarrassed by what hey had to do and could win.


Lucy then turned to Wendy will pouting about being told no. “On second thoughts sis, how about we do it.” Said Lucy smiling as she saw her little sisters eyes gleam in excitement.

“Really? But wait I thought you found this immature.” Questioned Wendy with a catty look on her face as she started to question Lucy’s motives.

“Well honestly they want us back in he game show and I think if we stay like this right now when we have to swap again it won’t be embarrassing and we could win easily.” Admitted Lucy as Wendy’s face suddenly became a bit more devious.

“Ok fine we can swap sis but on one condition, I get to pick what you have to wear every day.” Explained Wendy excitedly as Lucy blushed.

“B-but I don’t pick you’re clothes.” Stuttered Lucy, as Wendy glared at her which told her that it was Wendy’s way or no deal. Eventually Lucy decided to say
11121112.title: Emergency

choices: Wendy takes Lucy to the mall
111211121.content:
Lucy stood there for a minute in silence before sighing knowing that if she wanted to make the quiz easier for the both of them, she would have to play by Wendy’s rules.

“...ok Fine Wendy I’ll still pretend to be you, and you can dress me up however you want.” Lucy said with a timid smile on her face as Wendy’s eyes gleamed with excitement.

“Really Sis!” Excitedly shrieked Wendy making Lucy giggle at how cute her sister was being.

“Yes Sis really.” Said Lucy, as Wendy rushed upstairs to her bedroom excitedly giggling, while Lucy started to become slightly worried about what was about to happen to her.

“Ugh sis what are you doing up there?” Questioned a Nervous Lucy who would get an answer to her question as Wendy came back downstairs into the living room with a pile of clothes, shoes and hair accessories.

“Oh nothing really, I only wanna play dress up with my little sister, unless she wants to swap back and forget about the deal?” Said Wendy mischievously knowing that Lucy didn’t have a choice but to do this, even if she did find it embarrassing.

Lucy meanwhile took in a deep breath as she realised was gonna have to do something she really considered immature.

“Oh ok fine what do you want me to wear then big sis.” Muttered out Lucy which made Wendy giggle.

Wendy then went through the pile of clothes and decided to make her wear her school uniform, which consisted of a red tartan skirt, a frilly white school shirt, a red tie, ruby Mary Jane shoes, white knee high socks and two tartan bows for Lucy’s hair.

Lucy sighed when seeing the outfit that Wendy had picked for her. “Do I really have to wear that?” She asked Lucy only to be given the glare again by Wendy making her realise she didn’t really have much of a choice.

Lucy then sighed as she stripped out of the clothes she was wearing and began to slip on the school uniform, starting with the white knee high socks that fitted surprisingly well, she then put on the red tartan skirt and began to button up the frilly white shirt, with Lucy finishing her dress up session by putting on the Mary Janes and the red tie.

“Ok I’m done sis, I’m dressed up now.” Said Lucy embarrassed by what she was wearing as Wendy looked at her with judging eyes which made Lucy feel a bit unnerved.

“Ohh Sis you look good but you forgot something.” Playfully remarked Wendy as Lucy looked around trying to see what she forgot.

Wasn’t then walked over to her confused sister and began to put the two red tartan bows in her hair, putting her hair into a messy pigtail, which Lucy found embarrassing as she now fully looked like her little sister going to school.

“Awe you look so adorable sis, I bet you love how cute you look.” Joked Wendy as Lucy’s face went cherry red, as Lucy knew that as embarrassing as she found this, Lucy also loved dressing like a little girl which she hated as she was supposed to be an adult now.

For the rest of the night Wendy then forced Lucy to wear multiple outfits of hers ranging from, girly dresses to her favourite Disney princess costumes, which both sisters were enjoying, even if one of them was hiding it. But eventually both sisters were tired.

“Ok sis it’s time for bed, now go put on your Pjs and go to bed.” Commands Wendy surprising Lucy as she began to walk upstairs into her bedroom. However Lucy would only spend a few minutes in her bed room before Wendy would come in.

“Um sis what are you doing in my bedroom, remember I’m the big sister which means you have to stay in my bedroom and wear my adorable pyjamas”. Explained Wendy making her sister blush as she tried to make a Point.

“But Sis we only swapped clothes not-” tried to argue Lucy only to be interrupted by her little sister acting like her.

“No buts little lady now go to you’re room and go to bed in your Pjs or else I’ll make you go outside in one of you’re Disney princess costumes.” Sternly commanded Wendy making Lucy blush as knew she never wanted to be seen outside in what she was wearing.

“Yes big sis.” Said Lucy as she submitted walking to Wendys girly bedroom and putting on the embarrassing Disney princess pyjamas she had bought for Wendy last year, with the Pjs being pink and having a photo of Cinderella, belle and Jasmine on the front of them.

Meanwhile Wendy excitedly began to strip down and put on Lucy’s nightie as she and Lucy went to bed.... the next day

1112112.title: Wendy

11121123.content:
The host looked at Lucy and could tell that she was embarrassed by how immature and childish she looked in her little sisters blue sunny dress.

“So Lucy tell me do you enjoy looking as young and as sweet as you’re little sister.” Asked the Host with a smug grin on their face as Lucy blushed, and the audience snickered while Wendy smiled enjoying the idea of her older sister now looking younger than her.

“To be honest with you not all that much, I would rather just put once my clothes again.” Lucy answered sheepishly as the audience went quiet, in preparation for what was going to happen next.

“Oh well Lucy you ain’t gonna like the next challenge we give you, as for your next challenge we want you to go outside onto the streets and pretend to be a little girl and try and get another little girl to swap clothes with you, for 500 points.” Explained the host as Lucy felt herself did inside.

She didn’t mind dressing up like a little girl, heck to some extent she knew she enjoyed it, but going outside and pretending to be one was just plain wrong in her mind, however Wendy wasn’t going to let that happen.

“Sis we need the points it’ll put us in the lead, just do it.” Whispered Wendy confidently as Lucy took a second to think the decision through, while Wendy hoped to see her big sister act like a little girl.

Lucy then sighed as she looked at the host. “Ok fine I’ll do the challenge.” She said feeling embarrassed, hoping her boss or worse her friends don’t see this episode of the show.

The crowd then roared with thunderous applaud as Lucy was given a pink fluffy teddy bear with a secret camera in it to film everything that happens to her outside to prove she did the challenge.

Lucy then hugged her sister as she went outside to humiliate herself for tv.

“So Wendy are you excited to watch your sister act your age.” Asked the host digging for a good answer that was sure to bring in the ratings.

“Oh yeah of course I always wanted to have my sister play dress up with me and this is just as good.” Replied Wendy getting a massive awe from the audience as the host chuckled.

“Well I’m sure you’ll enjoy watching it with us through the secret cam so let’s see how you’re sister is doing.” Replied the host as he turned everyone’s attention to the tv screen.

*meanwhile with Lucy*

Lucy was holding onto the teddy bear with her hears content as the tv crew dropped her off at a park she usually took Wendy to on the weekends. Lucy was shaking as she walked through the park feeling embarrassed and worried as she walked around, however Lucy then swallowed her pride as she decided to skip through the park and hum a song so that she looked believable as a little irk on her day out through the park.

“La la la la, I’m a pretty girly.” She sang to herself as she hopped foot to foot blushing a deep shade of red. With Lucy thinking to herself how ‘this is so humiliating, but at least the 500 points will make it worthwhile’.

Meanwhile Wendy, the crowd and even the host where in hysterics at the sight of the grown women acting so immature, with Wendy loving every second of watching her older sister act as young as her.

And as that was happening Lucy cold see the playground that Wendy usually loved playing in, knowing that they’re was bound to be a little girl she could swap with around there, however Lucy also saw the park benches in the area, and knew that a young girl could be throwing a birthday party there or something else. Lucy decided too.....

now dressed in his sisters clothes he called out to Britney "are you dressed yet sis"

It was an early Saturday afternoon and Olivia and her boyfriend were at the local fairground but to Olivia it seemed to be a little to big for a local fairground but decided to go as it was rare for anything like this to come to town and Simon (Olivia s boyfriend) had convinced her to go with him on a date

Where did they decide to go
131.title: Scenario 1

choices: Swallow his pride and let the smug Olivia swap shoes with him
Refuse to swap shoes and face the wrath of the magician and Olivia
1312.content:
Olivia and Simon walked around the fair for a while going on multiple rides that ranged from mediocre, to downright boring, disappointing the both of them, Simon then decided to drag Olivia around the park looking for something that could be fun and entertaining. Though Olivia wasn’t as happy about wandering as her feet where killing her as she walked in her black high heels.

She always hated wearing them but Simon always loved seeing her in heels and so she would usually just swallow her pride to make him happy, though she wished that Simon would be kind enough to have the same decency for her every once in a while, as it seemed to her that she was always being dragged to whatever Simon wanted but never what she wanted.

Eventually after ten minutes of walking Olivia’s feet were killing her. “Simon can we please sit down my feet are killing me and I can’t be bothered walking anymore?” Begged a exhausted Olivia who couldn’t be bothered walking one more step.

However Simon wasn’t interested as he began to stare at a mysterious and ominous building. “Awe come on babe, look there’s an escape room there and there isn’t a cue for it at all”. He retaliated as Olivia found herself growing more annoyed with Simon.

“But Simon my feet hurt.” She pleaded, however Simon wasn’t listening as he dragged her to her feet saying that “the escape room will probably have a chair in it or something just come on.”

Olivia and Simon then walked up to see a women dressed like a magician being the tickets saleslady.

“Hello there Olivia and Simon I see you wish to enter my escape room.” She said shocking the both of them.

“How do you know our names?” Olivia asked now more worried about entering the room now.

142.content: How does Ted Smith end up swapping clothes with someone
142.title: Ted smith

choices: Someone walks in on them first
1421.content:
Ted and his assistant Lindsey had stayed at the office all night so she could help him finish a project for an important meeting the next day. But one thing led to another, as it usually did, and at 6:15 the next morning, they were curled up on the couch in Ted's office, naked, sweaty, still high on the endorphins from their latest round of lovemaking. As far as they knew, they were the only ones in the building.

Lindsey stretched and ran her fingers through her dark brown hair, which she wore in short, extremely chic style. (Ted's, on the other hand, was long for a man, though he usually wore it slicked back at work to fit the conservative dress code.)

"I'm starving," she said. "Want something from the vending machine?"

"Anything with chocolate," he replied, still slightly dazed.

She slipped on his expensive powder blue dress shirt, then looked around the floor before stepping into his black leather oxford shoes. "Hey, that's my stuff!" he protested. She grinned and said, "It is way too early to be walking in heels, boss man," and marched out towards the break room.

Ted sat up, drank from a bottle of water on the end table, and tried to remind himself of the day's schedule. Lindsey returned with a couple of Snickers bars. She looked deep in thought.

"What's up?" Ted asked her.

"I was just surprised by how well these shoes and this shirt fit me," she said, walking around and turning to show off how comfortably she could move in them. "I knew we were about the same height, but still. You would think these were mine to begin with."

"My mother used to say we were lucky that my feet stopped growing before the rest of me did, so we wouldn't have to keep buying new shoes," he replied.

She looked down at her feet, then at his, and a wicked grin spread across her face. Ted knew that look meant nothing good for him, but couldn't resist asking, "What?"

She grabbed her black Louboutins off the floor and sat next to him. "Well, it occurs to me that if your shoes fit me so perfectly, then mine should do the same for you." She sat down and placed the high-heeled pumps on the floor in front of him. "What say we prove my hypothesis?"

"You want me to wear your shoes?" he asked, laughing nervously? "Didn't you just say it's too early for heels?"

"Too early for me to wear them after having spent all of yesterday in those pretty but uncomfortable things," she said, stroking his leg in a way that made him feel weak. "You, on the other hand, have just been cruising around in these low to the ground wonders, so I think your feet can take the Lobu's better than mine at the moment."

"I'm not going to wear your shoes!" he protested. "That's ridiculous. What if anybody sees me?"

Her fingers now moved to his inner thigh as she said, "The custodial staff doesn't even get here until 7:30. We are all alone. This is a safe space, and I want to see how sexy your legs and ass look in these. Won't you do it for me? Please?"

Between the pouty, sexy look on her face and the feel of her hand hovering near his groin, Ted felt powerless to resist. He let Lindsey squeeze his feet into the narrow shoes, then help him stand up. He wobbled a bit at first, then found his balance. He and Lindsey were the same height in bare feet, so he towered over her the way she usually did in heels.

She stepped back to study him, circling his body and whistling approvingly. "My goodness, you've got some nice legs, boss man," she said with a giggle. "How do they feel?"

"Better than I would have thought," he admitted. "They're a little pinchy, but they fit."

She encouraged him to walk around his office in them. After a few stumbles, he gained his balance and was practically gliding in them. "Goddamn!" Lindsey cheered. "Do you want some fries with that shake?"

"Satisfied?" he asked, trying to keep from blushing. He felt a bit embarrassed, but there was something else there — a feeling he was too afraid to fully recognize.

"I don't know," she said smugly. "If our shoes fit each other so well, maybe we should see how the rest of the ensembles look."

"What do you mean?" he asked, both nervous and excited.

She gestured to his expensive navy pinstripe three-piece suit, which was lying across his desk, and then to her sleeveless red silk blouse and black pencil skirt, and said, "I want to try on that fabulous suit of yours, and I want to see how you look in my clothes."

Ted's heart was pounding his chest. He was both terrified of the idea itself and at how excited he realized it made him. He wasn't sure what to do next.

14211311.title: Jessica believes they are each other

142113111.content:
Lindsey reflexively straightened her tie again as Jessica paced around Ted's office. She had played along with his decision for them to pretend to be each other, simply because she wasn't sure what else to do in that moment. But now Jessica thought she was Ted, and vice versa. And worse, the rest of the staff had started to file in. Even though they were new to this floor, the odds of making it through an entire work day without running into someone who knew who she really was seemed impossible. And even if they somehow did, she realized, it wasn't like Jessica was going anywhere. She was in charge of the whole company! And Ted was one of the company's most promising young executives. It wasn't like they could avoid her after today. If it wouldn't ruin the masculine persona she was trying so desperately to maintain, Lindsey would have cried (or, at least, pouted).

Something in her pocket buzzed, and she realized she had Ted's phone. She fished it out of her trousers and saw a calendar reminder (one that she had made, in her real job as Ted's assistant) for the big meeting they had stayed up late the night before to prep.

Jessica, who had been droning on about her management style, noticed her looking at the phone. "Something the matter, Ted?"

Lindsey wasn't sure of the right thing to do, or say, under these crazy circumstances, but she had to make a decision. It was a meeting with a company called Bannister, and Ted had to this point communicated with them only by phone and email, so they wouldn't necessarily know what he looked like. Plus, the thing was supposed to happen at the hotel where Bannister's rep was staying, which would get her out of the office for a bit and at least delay the moment of discovery by a few hours.

"I'm supposed to go to Bannister to make the pitch," she said, trying to sound confident. "Lindsey should have CC'ed you on the details yesterday. I really want to spend as much time with you as I can, but I really should be heading out for this meeting."

Jessica smiled. "Well, why don't I tag along? It'll do me some good to be out in the field, and we can get some more of that face time you wanted on the way."

Lindsey was cornered. She knew the pitch well enough to deliver it herself, but to do it in front of Jessica?

"At least it's better than staying here," she thought, before smiling, pulling on Ted's suit jacket, and gesturing towards the door, telling Jessica, "Ladies first."

Jessica snickered. "And here I thought no gentlemen worked at this company," she said.

She passed Ted, who was frantically composing a text on her phone, presumably about the Bannister meeting. "Lindsey," she said, trying to sound casual, while looking for an excuse to get him out of the secretarial bullpen before anyone noticed him. "Jessica wants to come with me to Bannister. Why don't you hold down the fort from my office? There's some reorganization in there I need you to do in there. It should take you at least until we get back."

Ted looked like he was about to have a stroke as he considered the way this day kept evolving, but then he composed himself and said, "Yes, sir." He got up, pivoted on the heels of Jessica's boots, and walked into his own office. Lindsey couldn't help admiring the way his ass looked in her skirt, and Jessica caught her admiring it. Lindsey motioned like she was going to apologize, but Jessica simply laughed and held up a hand in a stop gesture.

"It's okay, Ted. We've all had attractive colleagues. The important part is that you don't act on that attraction, right?"

"Right!" Lindsey answered through clenched teeth, and marched towards the elevators.

"Would you mind driving?" Jessica asked on the way down to the garage. "After all those years at the London office, it's taking me a while to readjust to driving on the other side of the road."

Lindsey felt through her pockets until she found the keys to Ted's sports car. He had given her many rides in it, but never once let her drive. She was suddenly seeing a silver lining in this dark cloud.

"Sure thing, boss!" she said cheerfully.
142113111.title: Jessica nd Lindsey head off for an off site mee...

1421131111.content:
After an exhilarating highway drive where even Jessica approved of her pushing the sports car to its limits, Lindsey arrived at the hotel. She checked her reflection in the mirror. She hadn't thought of her hairstyle as masculine, nor had anyone ever accused her of looking androgynous, but between Ted's suit and the lack of makeup and jewelry, she looked close enough to pass. If she told people she was Ted Smith, then the illusion was believable.

The Bannister rep was named Kevin Jarvis, a balding, friendly Englishman much closer to Jessica's age than Lindsey's. He did, indeed, believe her as Ted — and it helped that she had been CC'ed on all their emails and been on the line for all their calls, so she could throw in details from past conversations. The pitch went even better than the small talk, to Lindsey's amazement. She had never done this in a meeting before, though she'd seen Ted do it plenty of times. As she strutted around the room, her hand cockily perched on the pocket of her borrowed trousers, she realized that she had always envied Ted his position, and that she not only liked doing his job for the moment, but was actually good at it.

She was, she would soon realize, *too* good at it.

"Well?" she asked with a confident smile as she finished.

There was a long pause at first, and for a moment, Lindsey worried she had messed up. But she turned to Jessica, who was practically beaming with pride, and when she turned back to Kevin, she could see that he was just searching for the right words to express his appreciation of the pitch.

"That," he said carefully but enthusiastically, "was maybe the best presentation of its type I've ever had the pleasure to witness in person. You've convinced me this would be an incredible opportunity for Bannister."

Lindsey felt herself flush with pride. For the moment, all memory of this swap of clothes, and roles, or the disaster that was approaching her and Ted whenever they were found out, was forgotten. She thought of putting on some false modesty, but knew that the real Ted wouldn't. And she had gotten this far by acting like Ted, so instead she confidently asked, "So, do we have a deal?"

He smiled and said, "We do, on one condition."

Her confidence faltered a bit. "What's that?"

"We would want you to come back with me to Bannister HQ in London so we can work together overseeing Phase 1 of the project."

Lindsey's heart began pounding again. She was not at all prepared for this, especially once she remembered that...

"Phase 1 is meant to last six months," she said, only barely remembering to maintain her fake male voice.

"At least!" Jessica interjected herself into the conversation, looking delighted with this turn of events. "Depending on how things go, you might get to be on the other side of the pond for a year, maybe two!"

"Maybe two?" Lindsey asked weakly, contemplating an extended time of having to dress like a man.

The other two seemed oblivious to her distress. "Ideally, you'd be able to fly back with me tonight," Kevin said. "I really want to get started on this immediately. We could set you and, say, your assistant up with housing for as long as you'd need, so you wouldn't have to worry about anything at all over there. Do you think you could swing such a fast turnaround?"

Before Lindsey could say anything, Jessica stepped in to say, "Of course he can. You're going to love London, Ted. Trust me. And I bet your lovely secretary — what was her name again?"

"Lindsey," she replied, feeling fainter by the minute.

"Yes," Jessica said, "Lindsey will adore getting to spend some extended time over there at such a young age. Why, maybe she'll meet and fall in love with an Englishman! Wouldn't that be just darling?"

Lindsey tried to imagine telling Ted about this latest turn of events. On the one hand, this was the (temporary) solution to all their problems. They'd be leaving immediately. They'd be an ocean away from anyone who knew them, and thus would have a long time before anyone caught on — maybe enough time to figure a way out of this catastrophe. On the other, they would be getting in so deep that there might never be a safe way out. What, she wondered, would Ted want to do?
1421131111.title: The meeting goes well

14211311112.content:
Lindsey again roared the sports car down the highway, this time heading back to the office with Jessica, feeling at once triumphant about how well she had done in the pitch and anxious about what to do regarding Kevin's request.

"I should say that I already feel as if I'm going to miss you terribly," Jessica said as they walked through the secretarial bullpen back towards Ted's office. "Even though we've only known each other for a few hours, I have a very good feeling about you, Mr. Ted Smith."

"Thanks," said Lindsey, again fighting the urge to blush. As bad as things were on some level, she couldn't resist the idea that she liked being treated like a powerful executive. And, as she strutted past some admiring (or, at least, puzzled) secretaries, she also couldn't help noticing how much more she enjoyed wearing Ted's fancy three-piece suit and oxfords than she did tottering around in her tight clothes and precarious heels.

They arrived at the office, where they found Ted seated on the couch, Jessica's boots lying on the floor near him as he rubbed what were clearly aching feet. He sat up with alarm when he saw them and began trying to spit out an apology, but Jessica tut-tutted him.

"Now now, young lady, that's quite alright," she told him. "I've been there many times myself, particularly when I'm vain enough to wear those boots. They look fabulous, but I always pay for it later." She sat down next to Ted, pulled off Lindsey's pumps, and began putting on and zipping up the boots. She gestured to the Louboutins, and added, "Though I have to admit these are precarious in their own way. But you're welcome to them back, and I appreciate the loan."

"That's okay," said an anxious Ted.

Lindsey could see it was killing him waiting to find out how the meeting had gone, and to have a moment alone with her so they could regroup and figure out what to do next. She decided to help him, by offering, "Thanks so much for helping me prep for the Bannister pitch, Lindsey. It went better than we could have possibly hoped for."

Ted seemed so stunned by this news that Lindsey felt a bit offended. Did he really think she couldn't do his job if she had to?

Before either could say anything else, Jessica interjected, "So well, in fact, that I believe the two of you need to have a big discussion now. I'll leave you to it. Ted, let me know what she decides immediately so travel can begin booking tickets for tonight."

"Tonight?" Ted asked, but Jessica had already twirled around on the heels of her boots and was marching out of the office. Ted turned to Lindsey, looking both scared and even a bit angry, and demanded to know what had happened. She told him everything, up to and including the offer for them both to transfer to London, immediately.

Ted looked thrilled, then shocked, then afraid again. He gestured at how they were each dressed. "But, we'd have to go... like this? For six months?"

"Maybe longer," Lindsey said, parroting Jessica. "If the project works, we might be there for a couple of years."

"YEARS?!?!?" Ted bellowed in his own voice, before realizing that people outside might be looking, and added much more quietly, "How did this go from a silly little sex game into something where we're posing as each other for years?!?"

Lindsey paced, again noticing how much easier this was to do in a man's suit. "I know, I know," she said, before laying out the bright side. "But it keeps us from being discovered right now. Nobody there knows us."

"Yes, but Kevin thinks you're me, which means I have to be you," he replied, not appeased. "I've been wearing a thong and fishnets for only a few hours and I already want to kill myself!"

"Calm down, girlie," said Lindsey, now more than a little annoyed to hear him moaning about the fashion challenges she had to put up with every day of her life. "At least it buys us time to think of a way out. Maybe once we're over there for a bit, there's a simple escape hatch. Like, you apply for another job virtually, take it, and we come back to America as ourselves, never once having to return to this place."

"That's not bad," he admitted.

"And the alternative is to swap our clothes back now, walk into Jessica's office, confess, and probably both become unemployable in this field," she added.

"That would be very bad," he said. He slipped the pumps back on, cringing a bit as he did so, stood up and walked around in them again. "I think you're right. We go to England, role play for a few weeks with me coaching you..."

"... and vice versa," she added, thinking of how woefully unqualified he was for most of her secretarial duties.

"Of course," he said apologetically. "And then once we're sure the project is on the right track, I start looking for a job back here — just preferably not *right* here — and we get to return to our own lives. It's the best of a bunch of bad options."

"I agree," she said, even as a part of her realized how much she was looking forward to getting to be Ted for as long as that phase of the plan lasted. Maybe, she thought, she might even find ways to extend that phase. "I guess we need to help each other pack?"
14211311112.title: Ted agrees to go

Kevin returns while they are half dressed
142113111122.content:
"How did I get here?" Ted asked himself for the millionth time today. This was the first one where he was flying in a private jet over the Atlantic, though.

Kevin had gone out like a light the moment their flight took off. Ted had wanted to take advantage of the private time to gameplan some more with Lindsey, but she was mainly interested in enjoying the amenities of such high-class travel. After a couple of scotches, she had loosened her necktie, reclined her seat, and joined Kevin in slumber land.

Ted drummed his fingers anxiously against the arm wrest of his own luxurious seat. His hands were now freshly-manicured, his fingernails painted dark red. This was part of an elaborate impromptu makeover Lindsey had thrown together for both of them between the time they finished packing for London and when they had to be at the airport. Ted kicked off his already-hated pumps and wiggled his toes, which were painted matching shade of red. He had at least enjoyed the pampered feeling of the mani-pedi.

Other aspects of the makeover had been less pleasant, including a full body waxing session, getting his eyebrows plucked into a more feminine arch, and having hair extensions sewn in, to take his hair from collar length down to his shoulderblades, where the added locks cascaded in blonde waves that even he had to admit looked great. Though he had always kept himself trim, his waist was now encased in Spanx, to help add to the feminine illusion, and his bra was filled with some convincing silicone breast forms. He stared at his reflection in the window, not quite believing that all of this had happened to him, and would keep happening for quite some time, because of how dumb he had been with Lindsey, and then with Jessica.

He studied Lindsey. He had always found her very attractive, even before the first time they fell into bed together, but he hadn't realized how androgynous her features were until they had swapped identities. While he was getting waxed and plucked, she had gone to a barber next door to get her still vaguely feminine cut trimmed down into something more conservatively masculine, with the back and sides buzzed close to her scalp and a clear side part. Between the hair, her prominent jaw, and eyebrows that she had always worn on the thick side, she looked close enough to male for Ted's expensive suit to do the rest of the work.

He tried mapping out how they would be able to both maintain their secret and escape this cross-dressing prison as quickly as possible, but eventually, fatigue got the better of him and he fell asleep, waking up with a gentle nudge from Lindsey on the tarmac at Heathrow.

"Wake up, Sleeping Beauty," she whispered in his ear, more flirtatiously than might have been advisable if Kevin hadn't already deplaned. Ted yawned, stretched, and pulled the accursed heels back on.

After a heart-stopping trip through Customs, where the officials paid surprisingly little scrutiny to their passport photos, Ted and Lindsey found themselves in the back of an SUV limo with Kevin, who was extolling the virtues of the corporate housing he had arranged for them. When they arrived at the building, though, Ted couldn't help noticing that the apartment that had been arranged for Lindsey was a well-appointed suite with a huge TV, a wet bar, a pool table, and other accoutrements, while he had been assigned a modest one-bedroom that Kevin referred to as "cute."

"Well, I should give you a few hours to settle in, unpack, and start adjusting to the new time zone," he told them. "I'll pick you up at 6."

"For what?" Ted asked.

"As luck would have it, tonight is our division's annual black tie dinner," Kevin said with a smile. "I can't think of a better opportunity for you to meet your new team." He could see their apprehension and added, reassuringly, "If you didn't pack for black tie, I can arrange a car to take you both out shopping."

"No, Ted has a tuxedo," Ted said.

"And Lindsey has several nice dresses," said Lindsey.

"It's almost like you packed for each other!" Kevin said with a laugh, oblivious to the truth of that statement. He left, and Kevin plopped down on one of the plush couches in Lindsey's living room. Lindsey followed suit, placing her feet up on a coffee table, folding her hands behind her head, clearly enjoying her new life.

"Pretty swank, huh, boss man?" she asked with a smirk.

"You definitely got the better end of the deal," he said.

"You haven't seen the dresses I packed for you," she replied. "Though I bet I look hot as balls in a tux!"

"Oh god," Ted sighed. "Do I really have to go to this thing tonight?"

Lindsey sat up, removed her suit jacket, and began unbuttoning her vest. "I mean, it probably doesn't make *me* look great if my secretary blows off our first social engagement. But I bet if we blame it on jet lag, nobody will care all that much."
142113111122.title: Cut straight to the trip to London

1421131111221.content:
"No, I should go," Ted said with a sigh. "I'm going to be at enough of a disadvantage as it is, having to dress and act like you. Better to meet everybody we have to work with at an informal setting."

"Oh, it sounds like this will be a very formal setting," Lindsey quipped, as she began opening up their luggage. First she produced a black men's tuxedo from Ted's garment bag, then withdrew a stunning red sleeveless gown from one of her own suitcases.

"Wow." For a moment, Ted was too awestruck by the dress to realize that he was going to be wearing it.

"Damn right, 'wow,'" Lindsey said, as she laid it carefully on the bed. As she began loosening her necktie, she pouted — an expression that looked wildly incongruous with her clothes and haircut. "I would have looked so hot in this, too," she added wistfully.

Within moments, Lindsey had stripped down to Ted's undershirt, boxers and dress socks. She yawned and ran her fingers through her close-cropped hair, then looked at Ted. "I've never worn a tux before, and I know you've never worn a dress like this before. You want me to help you first, or vice versa?"

Ted was still mesmerized by the dress. It was the first thing since this ordeal began that he found genuinely exciting, in a way he felt more than a little embarrassed by. He hoped Lindsey couldn't tell from his expression how badly he wanted to wear that thing, and instead tried to play it cool. "Why don't I help you put on the ol' monkey suit first?" he suggested. "The less time I have to spend squeezed into that thing, the better."

"If you say so," Lindsey replied, but there was something in her tone of voice that had Ted wondering if she in turn could read into how he was acting. He tried to focus on the task at hand, first helping Lindsey insert the studs and cufflinks into the crisp white tuxedo shirt before she put it on, then adjusting the black suspenders after she had wriggled into the tuxedo pants with their shiny black stripe, then adjusting the cummerbund for her more narrow waist. He gave her a crash course in tying a bow tie, to which she responded by asking him to get her a clip-on next time, then helped with the jacket and patent leather shoes. She posed for him and asked, "How do I look?"

"Like a million bucks," he told her sincerely.

She smiled at this compliment and mimed holding a gun before saying, in a terrible English accent, "The name's Bond. James Bond."

"Well, now I need your help, Mr. Bond," he replied, trying not to seem too eager to put on the gown.

"Of course you do," she said, returning to her suitcase for another item: a lacy red corset. "I have to stitch you into this torture device first."

Ted held up a hand in protest. He had seen women in these things up close before, and while they looked hot, they did not seem the least bit comfortable. "Whoa, do I have to wear that?"

"Trust me: the dress will look way better on you if you have this corset on underneath."

This were the exact words Ted needed to hear. He held up his arms in a gesture of surrender, and soon was wincing as Lindsey pulled the corset's strings tighter and tighter. "Torture device" was starting to feel like an understatement. But a moment later, all thought of pain was gone, as Lindsey slipped the silky dress over his head and pulled it down over him. Outside of sex — and not even all sex, at that — he had never had so pleasurable a feeling in his life as that material sliding across his newly-smooth skin. He shivered at the sensation of it.

"Yeah, that's right," she said with a smirk. "It feels nearly as good as it looks, doesn't it? And it already looks sensational on you!"

Ted really wanted to see his reflection, but Lindsey first insisted on accessorizing him: a matching pair of red pumps that were mercifully an inch shorter than the Louboutin's he'd been wearing since yesterday, dangly costume jewelry faux diamond earrings, a matching bracelet, and a fresh coat of makeup, including bright red lipstick in the same shade as the dress. She helped him to his feet, put her hands over his eyes, and led him to the mirror.

"My god," he said, when he saw his reflection. He could still recognize his own facial features beneath the makeup and the long hair, but it was an obviously female version of him — a gorgeous female version of him, at that. The dress fit him like a second skin, the neckline stopping just north of where his cleavage would be protruding from the corset, his waxed leg looking long and sexy from the dress's long slit in the front.

He wasn't sure how long they both stood there silently looking at the floor-length mirror, but it was obvious that Lindsey was as thunderstruck by the image as he was. "I don't know what to say, Ted," she finally offered. "I can't imagine I'd look any better in that outfit, and I'd probably look worse."

"Thanks," he said, before attempting to return the compliment. "That tux really suits you, too."

"Yeah yeah yeah," she replied, dismissing the politeness for what it was. "We both know who everyone in the room is going to be staring at when we arrive. Who knows? Maybe you'll even get lucky on your first night in the UK!"

Ted was too taken by the beautiful women he now resembled to even register Lindsey's joke. Or was it a joke?

When they finished, Kevin tented his hands under his chin, deep in thought, before looking up at them. "This is very, very bad, you two."

Then the two of you entered the United Kingdom illegally, using each other's passports. I'd be within my rights to report you to the police, your superiors, or both."

Ted buried his face in his hands, muttering, "Ohmigod ohmigod ohmigod." Lindsey felt like she was going to throw up.

Ted sat stewing at his desk, trying to distract himself from their predicament by doing work, but he couldn't focus at all.

"And," Jessica continued, "two of your colleagues have found a very dramatic and effective way to demonstrate this lesson." She raised her voice and called out, "Ted? Lindsey? It's time for your big reveal!"

As she got on the elevator and turned her back to her cross-dressed underlings, Jessica allowed the smug expression on her face to falter. She had been so enraged by catching Ted — the kind of cocky alpha male who got all the advantages she had had to struggle her whole career to duplicate — fooling around with his secretary, and on company property, that the sheer pleasure of being able to publicly humiliate him had overtaken her common sense. But now as they were minutes away from a very important meeting, she worried that she was cutting off her nose to spite her face. Amusing as it was to see Ted try to sashay around in his secretary's skimpy outfit, she didn't want to blow a big opportunity for the company on her first real day on the job.

She turned around and studied them. Ted's cheeks remained flush with embarrassment, but there was an unexpectedly serene and confident expression on Lindsey's face. If she felt thrown at first by the role reversal, she had already grown accustomed to it.

"You two have worked very closely on this presentation, yes?" she asked Lindsey.

Lindsey cleared her throat, reflexively adjusted her tie, and then said, "Yes, from the very start to the finish," in a tone that inspired Jessica to continue taking this crazy chance on her.

"Good," she said. "Then for the moment, I want you to come into the meeting with me by yourself, while Ted waits out in the hall."

Ted opened his mouth as if to protest, then seemed to realize that this would spare him anyone from outside the company seeing him dressed this way, and he closed it and looked down at the floor.

"Ted," Jessica added, waiting for him to reluctantly look up and meet her gaze, "you may yet have a part to play in this, but for now, I want to see if Lindsey can handle the pitch on her own. If we want you to enter the conference room, one of us will come out to get you."

"Yes, ma'am," he said in a defeated voice.

They were meeting with Kendall Grainger, a beautiful 40-year-old redhead, and her team from a biochemistry company called Pimco. Jessica knew her well, and Kendall beamed as she and Lindsey entered the conference room. The women hugged, but then Kendall stepped back and studied this young woman in a man's suit and tie.

"Jessica, it's so lovely to see you, but who is this?" she asked. "And where is Ted?"

Jessica took a deep breath, then said, "This is Lindsey Porter, Kendall, and I hope you'll indulge me for a few minutes. We're trying an experiment here at the company, starting today." She quickly explained this crazy role switching concept she had dreamed up (without revealing its true origins), and concluded, "So we're giving Lindsey here a chance to prove she can pitch as well as Ted."

Kendall's face had gone from confused, to concerned, to... delighted? She smiled broadly as she studied Lindsey like she was seeing her for the first time. "And here I thought you were just really into the menswear look."

"If I'm being totally honest, I really am now," Lindsey said. "I mean, I look like a total boss in this suit, don't I?"

"Literally," said Kendall, who delivered a big, throaty laugh — a laugh that told Jessica she had nothing to worry about.

Indeed, she needn't have worried at all. Lindsey strutted her way through the presentation like she had been doing Ted's job, and wearing his clothes, for years. As a finishing touch, Jessica had Ted himself come in to distribute the hard copies of the presentation for Kendall and her team to refer to later.

"My god, Ted," Kendall said, enjoying the hell out of the sight before her. "I had no idea how good you would look in a skirt and heels."

Ted grimaced again, but Jessica's mental gears were turning.

On the elevator back up to the executive floor, Lindsey kept pumping her fist in triumph. "I can't believe how well that went!" she cried. "I nailed it!"

"You really really did, my dear," said a pleased Jessica. She turned to look at Ted, who had been noticeably quiet since they left the meeting with Kendall. "And what's the matter with you, beautiful?"

"I am never going to live this down," Ted muttered. "It was bad enough when the staff saw me like this, but now Kendall and her team have. Word is going to spread, and I'm forever going to be thought of as the man in the skirt."

"But you look so good in my skirt!" Lindsey said with a giggle, playfully reaching over to goose Ted, who jumped forward, looking more miserable than ever.

"Actually, Ted," said Jessica, "I have an idea that may make you feel better about the whole situation. Or, at least, less alone."

Ted looked up and wiped a stray tear from his eye. "What idea?"

"Well, Lindsey was such an instant success trading places with you that I think I'm ready to expand the program," she explained. "Soon, we'll have an entire floor of managers and secretaries doing each other's jobs — and wearing each other's clothes."

Lindsey jumped up and down and clapped her hands with glee. "Yes! I can't wait!"

They stepped off the elevator to find a buzz of activity. Jessica looked around, searching for her next pair to swap. In one corner, she saw Rick Daniels, pushing 40 but tall, athletic, handsome, and, by all accounts, incredibly cocky. He was talking with his secretary Kelly Minter, an equally tall 30-year-old blonde bombshell whose beauty had been known to drive coworkers to distraction. Rick was telling her a joke — one that Jessica was sure wasn't nearly funny enough to generate the huge laughter with which Kelly was greeting it. Rick was wearing a smart grey double-breasted suit and wingtips, while Kelly was in a sleeveless red shell dress that just barely qualified as work appropriate.

In another corner was another of the firm's boy wonders: Billy Cooper, a slim 24-year-old wunderkind who didn't look old enough to shave, yet had already been placed in a position of power over Gail Williams, a stunning woman in her 30s with long jet black hair whose resume suggested was being wasted as anyone's assistant. Billy had on a slim-cut electric blue suit with matching tie, white shirt, and brown oxfords, while Gail wore a pink sweater set with a matching skirt that ended above the knee, and black peep-toe shoes with a 4-inch heel.

Jessica liked the idea of putting Billy in his place and giving Gail a promotion she had long deserved. On the other hand, the thought of Kelly having to hide her curves underneath Rick's baggy suits, while Rick had to squeeze himself into her sexy outfits, amused her even more than Ted's current misery.

Rick noticed her approach and paused his story to look at her. “Oh, hi, Jessica.” He tried to appear friendly, but she could tell he neither liked nor respected her, which only made her choice an easier one. “That was a very... Interesting idea you cooked up with Ted and Lindsey.”

Kelly giggled, and the sound made Jessica cringe inwardly. “Yeah,” Kelly said, “I can’t believe they agreed to swap clothes like that. You couldn’t pay me enough to put on one of Rick’s suits.”

Jessica’s disdain for the both of them was relaxed by glee at what she was about to make them do. “It’s funny you should say that, Kelly,” she told them.

Rick, though, had put two and two together and raised his hands in protest. “You don’t mean...” he began, horrified.

“Oh, but I do,” Jessica boasted. “I want the two of you to be the next members of this new pilot program. Go into your office, put on each other’s clothes, and the we’ll talk about your new responsibilities.”

Now both looked dismayed. Kelly looked down at her red dress and then felt the lapel of Rick’s suit jacket. She laughed defensively. “You’re not serious, are you?” she asked.

“You swap clothes with each other or you’re both fired,” Jessica said quietly but firmly. “This initiative is very important to me and to the company, and I won’t have my one disrupting it on the first day.”

Now both looked scared. “I need this job, ma’am,” Kelly pleaded. “So do I,” Rick whispered.

“Good!” Jessica said, triumphant. She gestured to Rick’s office. “Then go on in there, take off all your clothes, and start finding out how the other half lives.”

"Have you tried role play?" Lindsey asked.
"I have but nothing really exciting has come up, it's just a bit too standard in most cases.
"It all depends on how you handle it." Lindsey giggled.
"That's true," Tim replied with a snicker.

"How much work do you have left anyway?" Lindsey asked.
"Just some paperwork for the most part, as boring as ever." Tim replied. "You?"
"Paperwork as well, I usually kind of enjoy it, but it's been kind of repetitive lately." Lindsey sighs.
"We should probably get back to it." Tim said bored as he got up.
"Yeah, but before we head back up, I think I know a way we can make it more interesting." Lindsey said.
"Do tell." Tim asked, curious what she had to say.
"What if we do some role play?" Lindsey suggested.
"How do you mean exactly?" Tim asked.
"Since there is no one around anyway, maybe we could try out a small little role swap?" Lindsey suggested with a smile.
"So we switch work places?" Tim asked, not knowing exactly what she meant.
"Work, clothes... names." Lindsey grinned.
"I'm not sure about this." Tim said hesitantly.
"No one is around and it would at least be a bit more exciting!" Lindsey said excited.
"Okay, in the elevator." Was all Tim said as they made their way over to the elevator.

Tim was currently wearing his usual black business suit with his smart shoes, it looked clean and was his favorite. Lindsey was wearing a black dress with some heels and looked as professional as she could without wearing a skirt suit.
Tim and Lindsey entered the elevator and as soon as the door closed, they started to undress. Tim took off his jacket and shirt first, then stripped off his shoes and pants and lastly dropped his boxers, moving as quickly as he could. Lindsey was very fast with taking off her dress and heels and unhooked her bra, then dropped her panties.

Tim then moved over to his secretary's pile of clothes and stepping into the black panties. They had a small red lace on the edges and were very tight on his crotch. He then hooked the bra on his chest, which he did fairly easily and lastly pulled the black dress over top his head and stepped into the heels. Lindsey in the meantime had gotten dressed in her boss's boxers, comfortable suit pants, shirt and jacket as well as his smart shoes.

As they just finished getting dressed, the elevator arrived at Tim’s office

14231.content:
Lindsey strutted off the elevator, looking completely at ease in Tim's clothes, her hands leaning out of his trouser pockets. Tim, on the other hand, was instantly struggling to get around in Lindsey's outfit. The little black dress was so tight that his legs could barely move, and the high heeled shoes made him feel like he was trying to stay balanced on a tightrope 100 feet above the ground.

"How do you walk in this stuff?" he groaned as he struggled to follow her into his office.

She swaggered around to his desk, plopped down in his chair, and boldly put her feet up, her hands folded smugly behind her head. She gave Tim a pitying look, and said, "Awww, the sacrifices we make for beauty." She appraised him up and down, then added, "But in your case, cutie, it's surely worth the pain."

Tim eased himself down onto the sofa where Lindsey usually sat when she worked away from her own desk. It felt good to not be standing, though the heels still pinched his feet something awful. "I think you got the better end of this deal," he grumbled.

Lindsey straightened her black necktie and fingered the lapel of her suit jacket. "I could pretend to find something to complain about," she admitted, "but I think you're right. I don't know that I'm ever going to trade back."

"Don't joke like that!" Tim snapped.

Lindsey pulled her feet off the desk, stood up, wandered over to sit next to Tim, and gently stroked his cheek. "Who said I was joking?"

"Yeah yeah yeah," Tim said. "Now what?"

She checked the sleek Rolex on her wrist, then announced, "Well, we do have to finish up each other's work, but there's something important I have to do first. Give me your purse, please."

Tim handed over the purse he still had on his shoulder, annoyed that she had referred to it as his, and watched as she fished through it until she produced a tube of lipstick, an eyeliner pencil, and a bottle of nail polish. Seeing where this was going, he raised his hands in protest.

"No, no no," he insisted. "I'll wear your clothes for a bit, but makeup is where I draw the line."

"But I want you to look like your prettiest self," she said with a pout. "And I think you'll feel happier in these clothes too if you can see how you look after I do my magic. Please?" She batted the lashes above her big blue eyes, and he was putty in her hands.

"Okay, fine," he grumbled. She clapped her hands with delight, then spent the next ten minutes carefully applying color (mostly red) to his lips, his cheeks, his eyes, and his finger and toenails. The latter at least allowed him to take off the cursed shoes, but now he had to wait even longer just to get back to work. Lindsey leaned back to take in the full look, pleased with her work. She fished a compact out of the purse, flipped open the mirror, and shocked Tim with his reflection. He certainly didn't look like a woman, but he did look...

"Gorgeous," he said, almost in a daze.

"You bet your sweet ass you are," Lindsey said, before getting up and going back to Tim's desk. She began going through the paperwork, warning him that he would have to do the same the second his nails were dry.

Within 15 minutes, he felt comfortable using his hands again, and he was pleasantly surprised to find that Lindsey had been right. Even though he was just doing more paperwork, the swap of role — and clothing — spiced it up enough that it was almost fun to complete. He blazed through it in record time. He was so focused on the task that, when he looked up again, he was shocked to realize that Lindsey had gone... taking his clothes, his phone, his wallet, and his car keys with her.

"Where the hell did she go?" he asked, starting to panic.
14231.title: Lindsey teases Tim

142311.content:
"Yeehaw!" Lindsey screamed with delight. She was having the time of her life, driving way above the speed limit with the top down on Ted's Maybach convertible.

At first, she had stepped out of the office to use the bathroom. Since they were alone after hours, and since she was dressed for it, she decided to check out the men's room, and was disappointed it was so spartan, and without the profane graffiti she assumed was written on the stalls of every men's room in creation. But when she walked back towards Ted's office, she saw he was still so absorbed in his work (or, her work) that he hadn't even noticed her absence. And then a wicked thought occurred to her: I have Ted's car and apartment keys. Since they were playing around as each other anyway, she thought she would just pop over, take a few selfies on his couch, and then come back to the office. But now she was having so much time putting Ted's car through it's paces, she wasn't sure she ever wanted to return it, or any of the other spoils of this swap.

She pulled up to Ted's luxury apartment building and used his security badge and keys to let herself in. She had been there a few times before, but always when she was there to have sex with Ted. This was her first time to really appreciate the size and beauty of the place, especially compared to her own shabby apartment. She took her planned selfie on his brown leather couch, blasted some K-pop through his Bose speakers, then headed to the bedroom to go through his walk-in closet. She would have said that a huge closet like this was wasted on any man, but Ted's wardrobe of fancy suits, blazers, shirts, slacks, and other business and formal attire was so big and impressive, she couldn't imagine it being kept anywhere else. She paused to admire herself in the three-way mirror. She knew she looked good in Ted's navy pinstripe three-piece, but she hadn't realized just how good. She adopted various masculine and feminine poses, took more pictures, then began exploring the other options in the closet. As she held one jacket or another up in front of her, she began thinking about how much she would enjoy getting to eventually wear all of this stuff.

She thought about swapping her current suit for another — there was a charcoal wool one that she thought would really bring out the blue in her eyes — when she heard a loud knock at the front door. She went to answer, and it was...

However Jason decided to ignore the obvious questions, and instead calm his sister down.

“Oh Sis did this mean old button hurt you, I bet it would really hate it if you pressed it and showed it who’s boss huh?” He joked as he smacked the button.

Jessie laughed at her brothers joke and loudly said “yeah take this you mean poopy button.” Smacking the button, when all of a sudden a massive cloud of smoke appeared that covered the entire room.

Jason and his sister coughed and as the smoke vanished, Jason screamed effeminately at the sight before him.

His four year old sister, was now no longer wearing her Favourite dress but Jackie’s favourite dress, the white ones with pink flowers on them, and White sandals which bizarrely fitted her perfectly, and more than that her hair now sat long and combed with a massive pink bow in her hair.

That’s when Jason realised something was wrong as Jessie started laughing in joy. Jason was now dressed in a yellow sundress, with his groin being crushed by the new girly diapers around his waist now, Jason also realised his hair was now in pigtails just like his sisters usually was. And that he was wearing his sisters favourites sandals

“You look like a giant version of Me Big bro”. Laughed Jessie as Jason blushed shocked that his sister was laughing at him. Jason decided to try and grab the button and press the button to swap them back. The smoke then appeared again only with Jackie now standing in the door way.

“Woah bro, sis did you see what happened I was dressed as Jason, I had that tee shirt from the band metal lick a”. Poorly explained Jackie as Jason knew she meant Metallica.

Jessie meanwhile was still laughing. “Big bwo looked like me.” Shouted Jessie making Jason blush as Jackie burst out laughing, mockingly singing “you looked like a girl, you looked like a girl.”

Jessie then had an idea form in her head about how to have some fun. “Hey I had a idea, what if we swapped again and pwetended to be each other that way I get to be the big sis.” Explained an excited Jessie.

Jackie then became excited as well. “Yeah yeah I wanna swap again too that way I get to be the cool babysitter again.” Jackie added.

Jason then blushed as he realised what that would mean for him. “That means I’d have to act and look like the baby sister though.” He said in horror looking at his adorable little sister glee with excitement at the idea. Does he go along with it?

How about a story between two girls.


Rachel Dinkley: (age 18) is A skinny teenager with a hourglass body in her senior year of high school at Shakey Bones High School, a high school built on top of a Indian burial ground, which made Rachel want to go, she is a massive fan of the occult and creepy things, she wouldn’t consider herself a stereotypical goth as even though she had dyed her hair Dark purple, and enjoys wearing her black my chemical romance hoodie and ripped jeans. She actually doesn’t hate everybody she meets. Except for Michelle and her bitchey cheerleader friends, they always were rude to her and openly mocked her. But Rachel hated Michelle the bimbo with dreams of becoming a fashion designer the most as she had made the school get rid of their gothic occult club, which she was an avid member. Now what was in its place was a stupid photography club which she was forced to attend to ensure she had a more respectable extra curricular activity on her application for Yale.


Michelle Williams: (age 18) is a busty blonde cheerleader who is the most popular girl in school, who has big dreams of becoming one of the worlds most famous fashion designer. She has big dreams and wants to be the top of her class at everything and be in every extra curricular activity to show how great she is for the paparazzi that will eventually interview her when she is famous. However theirs just one problem in her dream for perfection. Rachel, a icky goth girl who rivalled Michelle in class for best grades and being in every curricular club, which she bested Michelle in for a while with the Goth occult club, however thanks to her influence with the students, and a buttload of daddy’s money, the club has been scrapped for a replacement photography club which made Michelle happy as she thought about how this would help her learn how to command models to pose for her photos, she has been enjoying the club for a month now as she gets to learn how to command photoshoots at school and at home with her 16 year old sister Daisy, who looked almost identical to her and loved modelling. Michelle loved her sister and her cute dreams of being a model for Michelle. However Michelle always wished she could make Rachel her model and force that gross goth to learn her place, he’ll if she could use a magical device to make Rachel like her sister she could force her to become her model and secure her chances at going to Yale at the same time, however such a thing was unlikely to happen unless Rachel joined the photography club, Right?

So are you interested?
