choices: Swap her hair and her clothes
1443331.content:
Rachel stood outside the door of the Photography club which she was less than stellar about joining, before a certain bimbo Rachel hated destroyed the club to replace it with this, there was the Gothic Occult club, a club that was all about the unknown, the supernatural, the Disturbing, and the morally questionable. She was the head of the club and loved it dearly and had such fun making friends with its members who all showed interest in it, and enjoyed exploring the schools own haunted history and disturbing events, especially about the ones that involved the apparent magical artefacts that the native Americans created, which were said to be reality altering and grand in power, the chief of the tribe said they were weapons of good when in right hands and weapons of evil in left hands.

Rachel never got what that meant and always found that part of the story confusing, but maybe that was because she was right handed and not left handed. But that bitch Michelle, the aforementioned Bimbo was and Rachel had no doubt she was evil, as Michelle had used her dads money and influence as the most popular girl in school, to get the ‘creepy and satanic’ club replaced with a photography club, which would oddly benefit her and her little bimbo sister, who exclusively wore slutty pink dresses and heels with both dreaming of entering the fashion industry.

And at this point Rachel though to herself ‘why do I even want to go this stupid club?’ But Rachel already knew the answer to that, because she needed the extra curricular activity to apply to Yale, which Michelle also needed too as both girls were fighting for the last application to Yale from Shakey Bones High School, with Rachel finding it annoying how the world force her to do something Michelle wanted rather than vice versa.

Rachel then sighed as she entered the class. She wanted to scream when she saw the black walls covered in horror movie posters, was replaced with baby pink walls covered in photos of Models, and nature. Their was no one in the class except for the teacher.

“Ah hello Rachel, the principal said you’d be joining us today are you excited to ditch all that creepy ghoul stuff and learn about how to take photos?” Asked Mr Prance, a skinny 40 year old man with a receding hairline who everyone knew was a spineless teacher who would bend to the whim of any student with authority.

Rachel sighed as she sarcastically replied “sure I look forward to taking photos of brainless models, and trees that have two orange leaves on them.”

Mr Prance then went quiet as Rachel went to put her stuff in the class locker. She opened what she thought was her locker only to find out that it belonged to the head cheerleader. upon opening the locked she saw something that almost made her puke, inside the locker was a hot pink bra, pink and white stripped panties, the blue top and white skirt that the cheer squad wears and of course her signature yellow ribbon.

Rachel blushes as she suddenly heard a voice behind her smugly say. “Hey fashion reject I know you wish you could dress as good as me but don’t even think about stealing my clothes!” She mocked making the gaggle of cheerleaders behind her giggle.

Rachel sighed as she turned around to see her tormentor and annoying rival Michelle, wearing her regular clothes which consisted of a with boules a pink double breasted blazer and pink business pants. Michelle always took pride in her appearance as she loved looking like the professional she was.

Rachel states dagger at Michelle as she mocked her saying “oh hello Michelle I see you’re in the club you bought with daddy’s whore money, I’m surprised you’re not grounded.” Which made the cheerleaders gasp in shock as Michelle growled in anger for a short second before containing herself as she smugly smiled at Rachel.

“Oh ignore her girls, she’s just still pouty about losing her nerdy ghost club.” Mocked Michelle as the cheerleaders behind her giggled, even if some didn’t find the joke funny.

Rachel then crowned as the girls walked past her laughing with Rachel finding her locker and putting her things in it, she also was surprised to suddenly see the empty class that looked like a ghost town, now packed with Cheerleaders and her rival.

Rachel then sat down in the only seat that was available, the one next to Michelle. Mr Prance then explained that the class would split into partners and take photos of whatever they want. To which Mr prance decided that it would be a good idea to put Rachel with none other that’s the blonde lefty from hell, Michelle.

Michelle felt an evil grin appear on her face as everything was going to her plan, while Rachel was confused as she realised that Michelle’s dumb blonde sister Daisy who loved skimpy pink dresses wasn’t in. “Hey Michelle where’s daisy?” She asked in curiosity to which Michelle shrugged and responded with “Um duh Gothy she’s unwell, she’s taking a sick day”.

Rachel felt uncomfortable about this but decided that it was better to get the stupid photo shoot over with rather than talk to the bitch that stole her club away from her.

Michelle then led Rachel into a room meant for photoshoots, and snickered as she locked the door behind them.

“I’m Michelle what are we doing in here, I thought we had to take a photo of something in the room.” Questioned a concerned Rachel.

“Well Gothy me and mr Prance had a chat, and he agreed to you posing for a few photos of me as it will help me with my career aspirations.” Smugly explained Michelle.

Rachel then felt herself grow furious. “What that’s outrageous! What if I say no?” Demanded Rachel as Michelle only laughed in her face.

“Well then say goodbye to this club and say goodbye to Yale dummy, now hurry up and pose for the photo.” Commanded Michelle impatiently as Rachel sighed and stood still as though she was posing for her school photo.

Michelle then snickered as she pulled out a mysterious hot pink glittery camera with an odd aura and took the picture.

*SNAP*

The camera went with a bright flash of light, with Rachel blushing as she saw that she was no longer standing normally, but posing like a model on a runway with a phone in her hand as though she were taking a selfie.

“W-what the” said a dumbfounded and scared Rachel as Michelle laughed maniacally.

“OMG Rachel I never knew you were so good at posing and by the way sweetie nice phone.” Insulted Michelle in delight as Rachel looked at the phone in her hand and realised it was her own.

Only the phone was different as it was no longer her black phone case with a skull on it but rather a hot pink phone case with a tiny pink bow on it, even the phone screen of a zombie eating a man alive, had been changed to a photo of a kitty playing with yarn.

“What the hell you bimbo, how did you change my phone case and screen?!” Angrily demanded Rachel confused by the prank being played on her.

“What how could I have done it I was taking the photo, and now let’s take the next one Honey, I was thinking you blow a sexy kiss to the camera like a naughty girl.” Smugly commanded Michelle as Rachel flipped her off in anger.

“Like hell I’d blow a kiss for a dumb bi-” resisted Rachel only to be interrupted by a loud

*SNAP*

And a flash of light as she found herself blowing a kiss right into the camera with Michelle laughing and squealing in glee. “Wow Rachel, who would of guessed you could be so naughty you little hottie?” Mocked Michelle as Rachel blushed in confusion thinking about what was going on. “Also wow your make up is fantastic honey.” Heckled Michelle further as Rachel was left confused until she looked in the reflection of the compartment mirror she was given by Michelle and screamed.

“Oh dear god my face I look like a bimbo!” Screamed Rachel as her face was now covered in makeup, with her cheeks having blush on them, eyeliner over her eyes and worst of all, Hot pink lip gloss on her lips and a pair of Pink hoop earrings to replace her skull earrings.

“What did you do to me you bimbo!” Demanded a terrified Rachel, who grew more scared as Michelle simply laughed at the question.

“Simple honey, you see when I decided to check your club before it was destroyed, I found a small dreamcatcher hidden in a box, I grabbed it and when I did it turned into a beautiful hot pink camera, and I knew instantly what it could do, it was an ancient device made by the native Americans to give them whatever it wants, and I’ve decided to make it mine and use it to swap you and my sister around, because if I make you into my little Bimbo model, I’ll have the Yale spot without any competition, of course my sister didn’t care just as long as I made her a mode once I was famous. And that’s enough info for now back to the shoot Gothy.” Monologued Michelle as Rachel looked on in fear.

“You crazy bitch, you’ll never get away with this!” Rachel screamed as she ran for the door only for Michelle to laugh and coldly say “oh no you don’t sweetie” as she took her third picture.

*SNAP*

Suddenly Rachel found herself posing provocatively in front of the camera again with her back to the camera as if she was showing of her shoes, Rachel then looked down and shrieked in horror. “Ah! My boots!”.

Rachel’s leather skull studded boots had now been replaced with glittery phot pink high heels that sparkled. Rachel knee this was bad as she couldn’t run or walk in heels leaving her trapped at the mercy of Michelle who was laughing at Rachel’s situation.

“Great pose Gothy, way to show of those Killer heels of yours, and remember you can’t get away from me or this camera, now what to change about you next?” Thought Michelle as she stared at Rachel. Michelle then decided to change....

info.brief_description: Based on curious clothes exchange by mick
info.description:
This story is about our main character swapping clothes with another person because of various conditions.
Multiple main characters will be available and will be described in the character selection, feel free to suggest any additional characters.
Side characters can be added as you wish as long as their inclusion fits the character and story, some side characters (like girlfriends or family members) could be predetermined within descriptions as well.

Have fun with the story without many limitations, just the usual stuff like no unnecessary deaths or gore, keep it fun for everyone (above 18 at least).
Make sure you keep the swaps descriptive and interesting, sex is fine, but don't overuse it as it is not the main focus of the story.
As well as this, try to make sure the chapters stay interesting and different, chapter which contradict previous chapter will be deleted.

Try not to just start suggestions unless you write a chapter starting your story

If you want additional story options please feel free to ask and feel free to add
